channel.title: Classroom on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Classroom on LiaScript

item.title: Collaborative drawings made with LiaScript
item.description: In this article we will explore how to create a collaborative drawing canvas (in other words a whiteboard) using LiaScript’s internal publish -subscribe mechanisms.

item.title: eLearning Africa 2024
item.description: In June 2024, the eLearning Africa Conference took place in Kigali, Rwanda.

item.title: LiaScript Tutorial an der TU Bergakademie Freiberg (German)
item.description: In diesem Tutorial werden die neusten Features und das “neue” Design von LiaScript vorgestellt.
